amendment.description: To limit the funds available to the Department of Defense for expenses relating to conferences.

action.text: Amendment SA 4787 proposed by Senator Coburn.
Motion to table amendment SA 4787 made in Senate.
Motion to table amendment SA 4787 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 60. Record Vote Number: 223.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4787 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
